channel.title: Noob js question

item.title: Noob js question
item.dc:creator: @jal_knight jal knight
item.description:
@jal_knight wrote:

var orange = function(price) {
	var orangeCost = orangeCost * 5;
	console.log("Your Oranges cost" .orangeCost);
};
orangeCost(5);

I’ve even tried changing it up

var orangeCost = function(price) {
	var orangeCost = (5).orangeCost;
	console.log("Your oranges cost" .orangeCost);
};
orangeCost(5);

y u no work?

dangit justaguy your usually all over my posts in a matter of seconds! lol[/code]

never mind im an idiot…

var orangeCost = function (price)
{
console.log(price * 5);
};

orangeCost(5);

Read full topic
